reasoning: Adding Word export follows clear existing patterns from PDF export. The markdown parser and MarkdownElement structure are already format-agnostic and reusable. Requires research on docx library API but scope is well-contained to main process export services.

scope.notes: Changes localized to main process (src/main/). Files: 1) new word-service.ts, 2) handlers.ts (add IPC handlers), 3) ipc-contracts.ts (add types), 4) schemas.ts (add validation), 5) preload.ts (expose API), 6-8) UI components for format selection. Markdown parser is already reusable.

integrations.notes: docx.js is the most popular Node.js library for Word document generation. Well-documented, maintained, and widely used. No external API calls - purely local file generation.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure changes needed. Word export uses same file system patterns as PDF export. No new environment variables or configuration required.

knowledge.notes: PDF export provides excellent pattern to follow. Key reusable components: parseMarkdown() function and MarkdownElement interface. Research needed specifically for docx library API (Document, Paragraph, TextRun, Table objects).

concerns: Word styling may not perfectly match PDF styling
Mermaid diagrams need special handling (image embedding)
risk.notes: Low risk - additive feature that doesn't modify existing PDF functionality. docx library is mature and well-tested. Fallback gracefully if diagram conversion fails.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Medium risk - new export format touching multiple files. Unit tests for Word service functions, integration tests for IPC handlers. No security concerns as it's local file generation only.

reusable_components: IPC handler patterns from PDF export
key_insights.architectural_approach: Create parallel word-service.ts following pdf-service.ts pattern. Convert MarkdownElements to docx objects using docx library. Add export:word IPC channel alongside existing pdf: channels.
key_insights.implementation_strategy: 1) Research docx library API, 2) Create word-service.ts with element-to-docx converters, 3) Add IPC handlers, 4) Update UI with format selection dropdown
